front.title: IEEE Standard for Electronic Distribution of Blank Ballots for Voting Systems
front.abstract: This standard specifies electronic data interchange formats for blank ballot distribution, primarily to assist in satisfying the needs of the Uniformed and Overseas Citizens Absentee Voting Act (UOCAVA) and Military and Overseas Voter Empowerment (MOVE) Act. Subsequent standards will address other requirements for electronic data interchange formats used by components of voting systems for exchange of electronic data. This scope does not include return of cast ballots by electronic means. (This PDF of this standard is available as part of the IEEE Get program. Through the IEEE SA and industry support, select IEEE standards are available for download at no charge. For more details go to our web page at https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page.)
